arts.sum: It wasn't one for the highlight reels with both sides left with plenty to work on

arts.ttl: St Mirren vs Motherwell predictions: The Well a steely prospect in Paisley
arts.sum: Fresh from giving the Old Firm a run on the opening weekend, St Mirren and Motherwell meet in a match Steve Davies believes is too close to call.

arts.ttl: Rangers vs Dundee predictions: Gers to sink the Dark Blues
arts.sum: James Mason is expecting a routine victory for Rangers when they welcome Dundee to Ibrox for Scottish Premiership action on Saturday.

St Mirren were very close to coming away with a point at Parkhead versus Celtic, unlike Motherwell who found a late leveller against Rangers at Fir Park on the opening weekend of the Scottish Premiers...
